messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Safe Harbors & Extreme behavior
messages.msgSnippet: A harbor is a safe place for a ship, but that s not what ships are for!  Forget who said it... My thots, Tim T
messages.messageBody:
"A harbor is a safe place for a ship, but that's not what ships are for!" Forget who said it...

My thots,
Tim T

>
>Part of the big lie in our culture is "safe sex".
>No such thing.
>Check out the actual statistics.

>Part of the big lie in our culture is that there's "safe" anything, that we
>can keep our children or ourselves safe. What we can do is take steps to
>increase our safety, but too many of those steps and we end up with a
>severely restricted life. Reminds me of the discussion we had a while back
>about letting kids go places by themselves, etc.

>Even waiting for marriage and being monagamous isn't safe, as shown by the
>number of women with AIDS whose husbands were sleeping around.
>Tia
